issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

If your phone has USB debugging turned on, it does not crash and works great. But as soon as you turn off USB debugging, i can reliably crash the app every time.

Base UI > Window (Standalone) > Open (plain)

Unfortunately due to the nature of the crash (doesnt happen in debug mode) i can provide no trace log.

{html}
fields.summary: KitchenSink crashes on device when not in USB debugging mode (ANDROID)

comments.body:
{html}

Could not duplicate in latest release. 1.2.0 development.

{html}
